ja495:11.1: ca → te (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed), rājā → rājā ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
ja495:13.1: Kiṅkiṇikāyo → kiṅkiṇiyo (sya1ed, sya2ed) | kiṅkaṇikāyo (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr), gahetvā → gahetvāna (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja495:17.6: gāmamhi vā vanamhi vā → gāmamhi ca vanamhi ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | gāmamhi nigamamhi vā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja495:25.2: Ambaṃ jambuṃ vibhītakaṃ → ambaṃ jambuvibhīṭakaṃ (bj) | ambajambuvibhīṭakaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja495:36.1: brahmaññā → te brahmaññā (bj) | brāhmaññā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | te brāhmaññā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja495:43.1: luddakasamā rāja → luddakā te mahārāja (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja495:52.4: Khippañca ne → khippañca te (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | khippaṃva ne (mr)
